Reviews.Title: Most sensitive, fragile tablet ever.
Reviews.Author: Henry B.
Reviews.Content: I got it from tigerdirect with an internet security bundle for the rebate, and the reviews were dead-on.It's glass, not gorilla glass, so if you don't put it down on a surface with the utmost care, it'll crack. Mine has a long crack down the middle all because I placed it on the countertop, letting it drop the rest of the way, as one end was at a 10 degree angle or less to the surface. Now, I have to tilt the tablet when I type because it won't register my pressing of certain buttons when it's upright/sideways.Also, when I watch videos, it sometimes just stops halfway through.

Reviews.Title: Quality and service
Reviews.Author: Norm Peters
Reviews.Content: I purchased a maylong 7" tablet for my grandaughter for Christmas, about a month later it broke, we sent it to the company to have it repaired, now the company won't return e-mails, or phone calls, and the kid is out of a christmas gift.My advice, go to Best Buy,or wal mart and do a face to face purchase where you can see and talk to someone. Is there a negative star rating. ?
